sentences.sContent: He was found guilty of possessing indecent photographs.
sentences.sCn: 他被判藏有淫秽照片罪。

sentences.sContent: You can’t go out in that dress – it’s positively indecent!
sentences.sCn: 你不能穿那种衣服外出——太不雅观了！

synos.tran: 下流的；不礼貌的；不得体的

words.tran: 猥亵地；下流地；不堪入目地

trans.tranCn: 下流的；不礼貌的；不得体的
trans.tranOther: something that is indecent is shocking and offensive, usually because it involves sex or shows parts of the body that are usually covered
